description: Vertical padding inside the input field (top and bottom spacing between border and content).
name: --fkt-input-vertical-padding

description: Horizontal padding inside the input field (left and right spacing between border and content).
name: --fkt-input-horizontal-padding

description: Border color of the input in its normal (default) state.
name: --fkt-input-border-color

description: Border color of the input when it gets focused
name: --fkt-input-border-focus-color

description: Color of the label in its normal (default) state.
name: --fkt-input-label-color

description: Color of the label when it gets focused
name: --fkt-input-label-focus-color

description: Border radius for input
name: --fkt-input-border-radius

description: Font size for input text and placeholder.
name: --fkt-input-font-size

description: Color for text written into input
name: --fkt-input-text-color

description: Modal background color for date picker.
name: --fkt-date-picker-modal-background-color

description: Modal text color for date picker.
name: --fkt-date-picker-modal-text-color

description: Modal width for date picker.
name: --fkt-date-picker-modal-width

description: Modal padding for date picker.
name: --fkt-date-picker-modal-padding

description: Modal border radius for date picker.
name: --fkt-date-picker-modal-border-radius

description: Modal border color for date picker.
name: --fkt-date-picker-modal-border-color

description: Calendar cell size for date picker.
name: --fkt-date-picker-cell-size

description: Calendar cell hover background color.
name: --fkt-date-picker-cell-hover-bg

description: Calendar cell selected background color.
name: --fkt-date-picker-cell-selected-bg

description: Calendar cell selected text color.
name: --fkt-date-picker-cell-selected-color

description: Calendar header text color.
name: --fkt-date-picker-header-color

description: Gap between calendar elements.
name: --fkt-date-picker-modal-gap
